subject: Debugging a test method with JUnit 3.5 and JBuilder 4.0
msgSnippet: I found a couple others have this same problem (the debugger doesn t stop at the breakpoint) and I haven t found a solution.  I tried the - noloading option
messageBody:
I found a couple others have this same problem (the debugger doesn't
stop at the breakpoint) and I haven't found a solution. I tried the -
noloading option but that didn't make a difference either. Is there
a solution for this?

MichaÃ«l
